alert.note: Alert for Potter; Sully (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 07 at 4:49PM MDT until May 07 at 5:15PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: The National Weather Service in Aberdeen has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Sully County in central South Dakota... Central Potter County in north central South Dakota... * Until 615 PM CDT. * At 549 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Gorman, or 7 miles southwest of Gettysburg, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Gettysburg around 600 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Lebanon. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Aberdeen.
